title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Searcg for references to this field5.
OB: When performing a search for references to this field5 and double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: The first match should be selected when double-clicking on a search result.
SR:
1. Open the external jar in the application.
2. Perform a search for references to 'field5'.
3. Double-click on the first search result.
4. Observe that the first match is not selected.
